about_the_game:
Make The World's Best Burger!

Fast Burger Simulator is a fast-paced cooking simulation game where players manage their own hamburger restaurant. As restaurant owners, players must efficiently manage their time and resources to fulfill customer orders, improve the restaurant's reputation and expand their business.

At the beginning of the game, players step into the game world as the owner of a restaurant. Players need to open a hamburger restaurant with initial capital and get the restaurant ready to serve customers. At this point, players can customize their menu to meet customers' needs and create unique burgers using a variety of ingredients and cooking methods.

When customers arrive at the restaurant, players must take and prepare their orders quickly. As players fulfill orders correctly, customer satisfaction will increase and the restaurant's reputation will rise. This will lead to more customers coming to the restaurant and more business being done.

There are many ways for players to improve their restaurant. For example, players can expand their menu by purchasing new ingredients. They can also make their work faster and more efficient by purchasing new cooking methods and equipment. Also, by decorating their restaurants, players can improve the atmosphere and make customers happier.

Players can also expand their business by purchasing new machines to do more work. Buying machines allows players to serve more customers and earn more money. However, players must manage to manage the business of their existing restaurant before buying new machines.

Fast Burger Simulator is an enjoyable cooking simulation game for both beginners and experienced players. The fast-paced gameplay requires players to efficiently manage their time and resources, while allowing them to hone their restaurant business and management skills. For a fun and addictive experience, Fast Burger Simulator

name: Fast Burger Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 / Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fast Food Shop Simulator Game. Make the best burger in the world.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish
